entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
